org.trellisldp.api

Interface CacheService<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoopCacheService, NoopProfileCache, TrellisCache

    public interface CacheService<K,V>
    A generalized caching service for Trellis.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V get(K key, Function<? super K,? extends V> mappingFunction)
      Get a value from the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get(K key,
      Function<? super K,? extends V> mappingFunction)
        Get a value from the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        mappingFunction - attempts to compute a mapping for the specified key
        Returns:
        a value for that key or null
